text: tatha yaad karo ki allaah ne aad jaati ke dhvast kie jaane ke pashchaat tumhen dharatee mein adhikaar diya hai aur tumhen dharatee mein basaaya hai, tum usake maidaanon mein bhavan banaate ho aur parvaton ko taraashakar ghar banaate ho. atah allaah ke upakaaron ko yaad karo aur dharatee mein upadrav karate na phiro
